mapper.insert: INSERT INTO diagnostic (recordId, result, prescription, orders) VALUES (#{recordId}, #{result}, #{prescription}, #{orders})
mapper.select: SELECT d.diagnosticId, d.recordId, d.result, d.prescription, d.orders, r.status, r.score, doc.doctorId, doc.doctorName as docName, doc.hospitalName, doc.departmentName FROM diagnostic d JOIN record r ON d.recordId = r.recordId JOIN doctor doc ON r.doctorId = doc.doctorId WHERE r.status = 3 -- 只选择已完成的诊断 ORDER BY CASE WHEN r.score IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END DESC, r.score DESC
